metadata.title: CVE-2022-25313 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, an attacker can trigger stackexhaustion in build_model via a large nesting depth in the DTD element.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
